name: Shattered Skies
description:
Explore a world made of floating island in your very own airship! Discover ancient ruins and temples, and find the 3 gears!

This game was made for the 2018 OGA game-jam with the theme: Heavens

Features:

  • Shattered Skies mix between random world generation and handpainted terrain
  • Fight mechanical monsters!
  • Explore a huge world filled with old journals and ancient ruins!
  • Uncover three temples filled with traps, enemies and puzzles!
  • Find special loot!
  • Fly in your airship and fire your cannon at your foes!
